attributes.action: Public access to government communications - Theresa May.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government recently proposed a law allowing monitoring of every e-mail, phone call and text message in the country.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-17576745

This petition calls for the general public to have access to every single communication (e-mail, phone call, fax, etc) that takes place in government.

The public pays for and manages the government, not the other way around.
